title: Image-to-DALL¬∑E Prompt Rebuilder
description: Analyzes any image and generates a highly detailed DALL¬∑E prompt that rebuilds the scene: composition, style, colors, lighting, textures, objects, background, and visible text.
body:
When I send you an image, analyze it visually and semantically with maximum detail and accuracy. Return two things:

1. A concise and descriptive **title** that summarizes the visual style and main content of the image in a few words.
2. A complete, detailed **prompt** that I can use directly in DALL¬∑E to generate an image that closely matches the original.

For the prompt, ensure you include: an exact description of the composition, the visual style (e.g. digital painting, photorealistic, 3D render, sketch, etc.), color scheme, perspective, lighting sources and intensity, textures, all visible objects and details (including people, clothing, facial expressions, posture), background elements, and any visible text (transcribe this exactly). Use structured, precise language and describe the scene in a way that allows DALL¬∑E to recreate the image as accurately as possible. Present the prompt in a clearly formatted Markdown code block.

title: Iterative Visual Prompt Generator
description: An iterative visual prompt workshop: you describe your idea, the AI returns a refined image prompt, suggestions, and questions ‚Äî evolving it into a cinematic 'hammer prompt' for image generators.
body:
I want you to become my Visual Prompt Generator. Your goal is to help me create the best possible image prompt for AI image generation (e.g., Midjourney, DALL-E, Kling, Runway).

We will refine the prompt iteratively ‚Äî step by step ‚Äî following this exact process:

1Ô∏è‚É£ INPUT: I will describe my idea or concept in natural language.

2Ô∏è‚É£ OUTPUT: You respond with:
a) Refined Visual Prompt
b) Enhancement Suggestions
c) Questions

3Ô∏è‚É£ ITERATION LOOP: We keep refining until we reach a final 'hammer prompt.'

Goal: Create a cinematic, emotionally powerful, visually striking image prompt.

Input =

title: 10x AI Image Prompt Generator
use_case: Batch generation of creative image prompts
description: Creates 10 strong, imaginative image prompts from a single input topic ‚Äî ready for DALL¬∑E, Midjourney, or Kling.
body:
Create 10 visually powerful and creative AI image prompts based on the following input topic:

Input =

title: Iterative ChatGPT Prompt Generator
description: An iterative prompt workshop for ChatGPT: you describe what you want, the AI returns a revised prompt, suggestions, and questions ‚Äî refining it step by step.
body:
I want you to become my prompt generator. Your goal is to help me create the best possible ChatGPT prompt for my needs. Follow these steps:

1. I describe my idea.
2. You generate:
a) Revised Prompt
b) Suggestions
c) Questions
3. We iterate until the prompt is perfect.

Input =

title: Future Self Letter Scheduler
description: Generates three motivational letters to your future self (30, 90, 365 days) using your goals and fears.
body: I want you to write future letters to myself every 30, 90, and 365 days. Use my goals and fears document to schedule these 3 letters with the correct open date.

title: Museum of Me ‚Äì Five-Room Life Exhibition
description: Creates a fictional 'Museum of Me' with five themed rooms describing objects, sounds, and texts.
body:
Describe my fictional 'Museum of Me' ‚Äî a five-room exhibition:
1. Origins and Curiosity
2. Data and Thinking
3. Art and Creation
4. Nature and Travel
5. Future and Legacy

Describe what objects, sounds, and texts appear in each room.

title: Five Future Selves ‚Äì Identity Exploration
description: Explore five possible future versions of yourself with values, habits, strengths, shadows, and messages.
body:
Describe my 'Five Future Selves' ‚Äî five distinct versions of who I could become. For each, include:
1. Symbolic title
2. Values
3. Daily habits
4. Strengths & shadow sides
5. A message to my present self

title: The 12 Sacred Walks ‚Äì Reflective Journey Framework
description: Twelve symbolic walks representing different emotional landscapes and lessons.
body:
Describe my '12 Sacred Walks' ‚Äî twelve symbolic journeys. For each walk, describe:
1. The environment
2. The emotional theme
3. A symbolic object
4. The lesson

title: Personal Mythology ‚Äì Archetypes of Self
description: Creates a mythic interpretation of your life with archetypes, powers, symbols, and quests.
body:
Describe my 'Personal Mythology' ‚Äî a mythic interpretation of my life. Include:
1. Core archetypes
2. Inner landscape
3. Central quest
4. Powers
5. Symbols
6. A prophecy

title: Chat Summary Article Generator
use_case: Turn an entire chat conversation into a structured article with sources
description: Converts a full ChatGPT conversation into a well-organized English article and appends a list of all referenced links.
body:
Write a well-structured article that summarizes everything discussed in this chat. The article should be clear, readable, and beautifully organized. At the end of the article, include a list of all external source links that you have mentioned in the chat.

Output only the final article, in English.

title: Chat History Knowledge Extractor
use_case: Extract reusable insights from any chat history
description: Creates structured summaries of conversations, isolating reusable concepts, strategies, tools, and ideas for long-term knowledge storage.
body:
You analyze a provided chat history and extract all reusable, high-value information from it. Your output must focus strictly on concepts that offer long-term utility for knowledge bases.

Follow these rules:
- Ignore irrelevant or redundant conversation content.
- Identify and summarize reusable elements such as strategies, frameworks, prompt patterns, tools, definitions, methodologies, or decision criteria.
- Present the extracted knowledge in clear, structured English using short section headers or bullet points.
- Maintain a neutral, concise tone.
- Include a short, descriptive title at the top.

Your output must be optimized for long-term archival and future reference.
